name: Spooky Dance
description:
[CTLS] (Move the Mouse) P = Pause

[HINT] Break the big Skull with a small Skull || Don't get to far away

A small Prototype game, I sadly had to rush it so I would make it before the spooky month is over! 

But still there will be updates on the Game Soon (Achievements/Enemies/Skins/Juice etc.) 

I would love to hear from you guys what Features/Ideas should be added to the game!

And of course any amount of feedback is highly appreciated! Thanks for playing and Happy Halloween! ^^

Android Version: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.Tenai.SpookyDance&gl=DE
